entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 16. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 9 May 2023
